drug.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: an illegal substance such as marijuana or cocaine, which some people take in order to feel happy, relaxed, or excited
drug.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: A lot of young people start taking drugs at school.

drug.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a medicine, or a substance for making medicines
drug.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: a drug used in the treatment of cancer

drug.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a substance that people doing a sport sometimes take illegally to improve their performance
drug.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: She was banned from the Olympics after failing a drug test (=a test that shows if you have taken drugs).
drug.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: a substance such as tobacco, coffee, or alcohol, that makes you want more and more of it
